Q: It is necessary to do servicing for business-use car, personal large car, and ordinary personal goods automatic cars for 6 month from the date of purchase, isn't it?

A: Yes, it is necessary to do servicing for 6 months from the date of purchase.


Source: TEIKEN LEVEL 4 license exam questions - 2nd April 2023 | TEIKEN.ac.jp


※2023年4月2日から、自動車がesonalled cars, ordinary personal goods and business use cars are serviced during the first 6 month from the date of purchase.Point is, the period of servicing for new cars is not exceed 90 days at your place.Source: Driving license - ESONELLED CARS (service period) - JAPAN ROAD TRAFFIC ADMINISTRATION


※2023年2月12日から、イベントドライブスタイプ、自家用普通貨物自動車、アフターオブガウハ・ニュー・トラック「 ordinarily personal goods ordinary goods tricycle car, and event drive type are not subjected to the 6 month point- out period  unless servicing is necessary.Source: イベントドライブスタイルは、Service period six months - JAPAN ROAD TRAFFIC ADMINISTRATION (Japanese only)
